mapper.sql: ID, MAINID, TDDID, TDDHCID, HT_CLF, HT_GSF, HT_QTF, HT_SL, HT_DHRQ, DHSL, RKSL, BZ, ZT, WHDWID, WHRID, WHSJ
T.ID, T.MAINID, T.TDDID, T.TDDHCID, T.HT_CLF, T.HT_GSF, T.HT_QTF, T.HT_SL, T.HT_DHRQ, T.DHSL, T.RKSL, T.BZ, T.ZT, T.WHDWID, T.WHRID, T.WHSJ
mapper.select:
select b1.id,b1.bjh,b1.zwms,b1.ywms,b1.cjjh,b1.gljb,b1.hclx,b1.jldw,b1.sn,b1.dprtcode,ztsl,ht_dhrq,hth,gysmc,lx from ( select 1 lx,t.id,t4.bjh,t4.zwms,t4.ywms,t4.cjjh,t4.gljb,t4.hclx,t4.jldw,'' sn,t2.dprtcode,t1.bjid,t.ht_sl-t.rksl ztsl,t.ht_dhrq ,t2.hth,t5.gysmc from b_h_00401 t
left join b_h_00201 t1 on t.tddhcid=t1.id left join d_008 t4 on t1.bjid=t4.id left join b_h_004 t2 on t.mainid=t2.id left join d_015 t5 on t5.id=t2.gysid and t5.zt=1
where t2.zt=2 and t.zt=1 and t.ht_sl>t.dhsl and t2.htlx=1
Union all
select 2 lx,tt1.id,tt4.bjh,tt4.zwms,tt4.ywms,tt4.cjjh,tt4.gljb,tt4.hclx,tt4.jldw,tt3.sn,tt2.dprtcode,tt3.bjid, tt3.kcsl-tt3.ghsl ztsl,tt5.ht_dhrq ,tt6.hth,tt7.gysmc from b_h_01301 tt1 left join b_h_013 tt2 on tt1.mainid = tt2.id left join b_h_00401 tt5 on tt5.tddid=tt2.xgdjid and tt5.zt=1 left join b_h_004 tt6 on tt5.mainid=tt6.id and tt6.zt <> 8 left join d_015 tt7 on tt7.id=tt6.gysid and tt7.zt=1
left join b_h_012 tt3 on tt1.wpqdid = tt3.id
left join d_008 tt4 on tt4.id = tt3.bjid
where tt2.cklx = 2 and tt2.zt in (2,10) and tt1.zt = 1 and tt1.tksl = 0 and tt3.kcsl > tt3.ghsl
)b1
order by b1.bjh desc,b1.id
order by ${pagination.sort} ${pagination.order}

select B00401.ID,B00401.TDDID,B00401.TDDHCID,B00401.HT_SL AS HTSL,B00401.HT_CLF AS BJ_CLF,B00401.HT_GSF AS BJ_GSF,B00401.HT_QTF AS BJ_QTF,B00401.HT_DHRQ AS YJDHRQ,B00401.DHSL, B00401.RKSL, B002.SQDH,B002.YQQX,B002.SQSJ,(B00201.SL - B00201.YCGSL) AS TDSL, D008.ID AS BJID,D008.BJH,D008.ZWMS,D008.YWMS,D008.CJJH,D008.HCLX,D008.GLJB,D008.JLDW, U.USERNAME,U.REALNAME from B_H_00401 B00401 left join B_H_00201 B00201 on B00401.TDDHCID = B00201.ID left join D_008 D008 on B00201.BJID = D008.ID left join b_h_002 B002 on B00201.MAINID = B002.ID left join T_USER U on U.ID = B002.SQRID where B00401.ZT IN (1) AND B00401.MAINID = #{mainid}

select B00401.ID,B00401.TDDID,B00401.TDDHCID,B00401.HT_SL AS HTSL,B00401.HT_CLF AS BJ_CLF,B00401.HT_GSF AS BJ_GSF,B00401.HT_QTF AS BJ_QTF,B00401.HT_DHRQ AS YJDHRQ,B00401.DHSL, B00401.RKSL, B002.SQDH,B002.YQQX,B002.SQSJ,1 AS TDSL, B017.SN, D008.ID AS BJID,D008.BJH,D008.ZWMS,D008.YWMS,D008.CJJH,D008.HCLX,D008.GLJB,D008.JLDW, U.USERNAME,U.REALNAME from B_H_00401 B00401 left join B_H_00203 B00203 on B00401.TDDHCID = B00203.ID left join B_H_002 B002 on B00203.MAINID = B002.ID left join T_USER U on B002.SQRID = U.ID left join B_H_017 B017 on B017.ID = B00203.KCLLID left join D_008 D008 on B017.BJID = D008.ID where B00401.ZT IN (1) AND B00401.MAINID = #{mainid}
select * from b_h_00401 b1 left join b_h_004 b2 on b1.mainid=b2.id where b2.zt<> 8 and b1.tddhcid= #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select
from B_H_00401 where ID = (select HTMXID from b_h_00801 where id=#{instockDetailId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.insert: insert into B_H_00401 (ID, MAINID, TDDID, TDDHCID, HT_CLF, HT_GSF, HT_QTF, HT_SL, HT_DHRQ, DHSL, RKSL, BZ, ZT, WHDWID, WHRID, WHSJ ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mainid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tddid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tddhcid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{htClf,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{htGsf,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{htQtf,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{htSl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{htDhrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dhsl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{rksl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{whdwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{whrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{whsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

insert into B_H_00401
ID,
MAINID,
TDDID,
TDDHCID,
HT_CLF,
HT_GSF,
HT_QTF,
HT_SL,
HT_DHRQ,
DHSL,
RKSL,
BZ,
ZT,
WHDWID,
WHRID,
WHSJ,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{mainid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{tddid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{tddhcid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{htClf,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{htGsf,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{htQtf,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{htSl,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{htDhrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{dhsl,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{rksl,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{zt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{whdwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{whrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sysdate,
mapper.update:
update B_H_00401
MAINID = #{mainid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TDDID = #{tddid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TDDHCID = #{tddhcid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HT_CLF = #{htClf,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
HT_GSF = #{htGsf,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
HT_QTF = #{htQtf,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
HT_SL = #{htSl,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
HT_DHRQ = #{htDhrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DHSL = #{dhsl,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RKSL = #{rksl,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BZ = #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZT = #{zt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
WHDWID = #{whdwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHRID = #{whrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHSJ = sysdate,
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update B_H_00401 set MAINID = #{mainid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TDDID = #{tddid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TDDHCID = #{tddhcid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HT_CLF = #{htClf,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, HT_GSF = #{htGsf,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, HT_QTF = #{htQtf,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, HT_SL = #{htSl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, HT_DHRQ = #{htDhrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DHSL = #{dhsl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RKSL = #{rksl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, BZ = #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZT = #{zt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, WHDWID = #{whdwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WHRID = #{whrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WHSJ = #{whsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
